page.title: 19SPIRITUAL NEEDS IN 1985
page.content: Holy Trinity Church, Takeley, lies to the west of the village where it has stood for over 800 years. Takeley Free Church stands in the heart of the village and All Saints Little Canfield stands all alone and isolated amidst the fields of wheat, barley and beans. Congregations have fallen over the years, but recently the appointment of a new Rector to the parishes of Takeley and Little Canfield has coincided with an increase in the numbers of people attending church services. This is particularly noticeable amongst the very young and the younger families. A good omen for the future.
